author: W3C Publishing Community Group Accessibility Task Force
description: Original wording discussed by a large group representing different actors of the English-speaking geographies. It has been improved after proof of concept implementations and panel testers

nonvisual-reading-yes.descriptive: All content is available in generated read aloud speech and electronic braille
nonvisual-reading-yes.compact: Readable in read aloud and braille

nonvisual-reading-maybe.descriptive: Portions of the content may not be available in generated read aloud speech and electronic braille
nonvisual-reading-maybe.compact: May not be fully readable in read aloud and braille

nonvisual-reading-no.descriptive: Not all of the content will be available in generated read aloud speech and electronic braille
nonvisual-reading-no.compact: Not fully readable in read aloud and braille

complementary-audio-text.descriptive: Contents available as complementary audio and text

full-syncronized-audio-text.descriptive: All the content is available as pre-recorded audio synchronized with text

Visual-adjustments-yes.descriptive: Appearance of the text and page layout can be modified according to the capabilities of the reading system (font family and font size, spaces between paragraphs, sentences, words, and letters, as well as color of background and text)

Visual-adjustments-no.descriptive: Text and page layout can not be modified. The reading experience is close to a print version. Reading systems can still provide zooming options

Visual-adjustments-unknown.descriptive: Ability to modify the appearance is not known

Navigation-toc.descriptive: Contains a table of contents that provides direct access to all chapters of the text via links

Navigation-index.descriptive: Index provides links to item references

Navigation-landmarks.descriptive: Landmarks provide quick access to main parts of the book

Navigation-page.descriptive: A page list enables users to coordinate their reading with a statically paginated version

Charts-diagrams-formulas-yes.descriptive: Contains accessible formulas. Charts and diagrams are present and described by extended descriptions
Charts-diagrams-formulas-yes.compact: Accessible formulas. Charts and diagrams have extended descriptions

Charts-diagrams-formulas-unknown.descriptive: Contains formulas, charts, and diagrams without any information about the accessibility of this content
Charts-diagrams-formulas-unknown.compact: Accessibility of formulas, charts, and diagrams unknown

Hazards-yes.descriptive: The publication contains rapidly changing lights or visual stimuli, as well as simulated movements, which can cause discomfort, distraction, photosensitive seizures, or motion sickness

Conformance-accepted.descriptive: This publication claims to meet accepted accessibility standards and reports EPUB Accessibility 1.1 and Web Accessibility Content Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA compliance
Conformance-accepted.compact: This publication claims to meet accepted accessibility standards

Conformance-minimum.descriptive: This publication claims to meet accepted accessibility standards and reports Web Accessibility Content Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level A compliance
Conformance-minimum.compact: This publication claims to meet minimum accessibility standards

Conformance-unknown.compact: Conformance to accepted standards for accessibility of this publication cannot be determined

Conformance-exemption-micro.descriptive: The creator of the publication is not required to publish in an accessible format because it is a micro-enterprise (e.g., enterprises employing fewer than 10 people and with annual turnover or balance sheet total not exceeding â‚¬2 million)

Detailed-Conformance.certifier-name: This publication is certified by {Certifier Name}
Detailed-Conformance.certifier-report: For more information, refer to the certifier's report {url}

aria-roles.descriptive: Content is enhanced with ARIA roles to optimize organization and facilitate navigation

video-captions.descriptive: Videos included in publications have closed captions and sign language representation
video-captions.compact: Closed captions and sign languages for videos

tactile-graphics.descriptive: Tactile graphics have been integrated to facilitate access to visual elements by blind people

music-visual.descriptive: Music scores are provided that are visually accessible

information-through-colors.descriptive: Content contains information encoded through colors, which may be imperceptible to those who cannot distinguish colors
